statements.select: UPDATE [dbo].[seq_number] SET [next_value] = CASE WHEN [next_value] + 1 > #lengthMaxValue# THEN 1 ELSE [next_value] + 1 END WHERE [seq_key] = #key# SELECT [next_value] FROM [dbo].[seq_number] WHERE [seq_key] = #key#

UPDATE [dbo].[seq_number] SET [next_value] = CASE WHEN [next_value] + #count# > #lengthMaxValue# THEN 1 ELSE [next_value] + #count# END WHERE [seq_key] = #key# SELECT [next_value] FROM [dbo].[seq_number] WHERE [seq_key] = #key#

UPDATE [dbo].[seq_number] SET next_value = next_value + apply_capacity WHERE [seq_key] = #key# AND next_value = #serialNumber# SELECT next_value,CASE WHEN @@ROWCOUNT>0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS set_state FROM [dbo].[seq_number] WHERE [seq_key] = #key#
